## filterDict() function

Filter a dictionary, using a predicate to be applied to each value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function filterDict<T, U extends T>(input: Dict<T>, filter: (value: T, key: string, dict: Dict<T>) => value is U): Dict<U>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | Dict&lt;T&gt; | Dictionary to filter |
|  filter | (value: T, key: string, dict: Dict&lt;T&gt;) =&gt; value is U | Filter function |

<b>Returns:</b>

Dict&lt;U&gt;
